description: This file contains CSS styles for a theme management system, defining variables for light and dark themes along with styles for various components of the application, such as headers and buttons.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center-aligned content. Background and text colors adjust based on theme variables.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, styled to hold content flexibly and center-aligned, using theme colors.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, featuring theme-colored text with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Style for the theme toggle button, which allows users to switch between themes with hover and active states.
